name: Super Hang-On
overview: The Western home computer versions of Super Hang-On were released between 1987 and 1989 for the Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, Commodore 64, IBM PC, Macintosh and ZX Spectrum. They are all based on the 1987 arcade game, Super Hang-On, a motorcycle racing game and the sequel to the acclaimed Hang-On.
